useCase.name: Pick up item

preconditions.precondition: The item is available to be picked up.

successEndConditions.condition: The item has been successfully picked up.

useCase.trigger: Controller initiates the pick up action.

mainSequence.step: Actor checks the location of the item.
Actor removes the item from the room.
Actor checks if the item is sticky.
Actor adds the item to the inventory.
Actor checks if the inventory is full.
Actor adds the item back to the room if the inventory is full.
Actor performs actions on the picked up item.
